map.name: Google Satelite
map.code: new OpenLayers.Layer.Google("Google Satellite", {type: G_SATELLITE_MAP, 'sphericalMercator': true, numZoomLevels: 22})

map.name: Hike and Bike
map.code: new OpenLayers.Layer.XYZ("Hike and Bike Map", "http://toolserver.org/tiles/hikebike/${z}/${x}/${y}.png", { type: 'png', isBaseLayer: true, attribution: 'Map Data from OpenStreetMap (CC-by-SA 2.0)' } )
